menu.navigationDescription: Access different sections of the application

errors.title: Oh no!
errors.message: Sorry, an unexpected error has occurred.

aiDisclaimer.text: AI can make mistakes. All data should be reviewed before making decisions.

compliance.matrixDescription: Clause types compliance distribution by impact level

risk.title: Risk assessment
risk.description: Grouping of occurrences to determine contract risk

classification.title: Categorization overview
classification.description: Overall clause types distribution per guidelines alignment
classification.unknownClauses: Clauses not matching any type from the guidelines

clauses.unknownType: Does not match any type from the guidelines
clauses.whyFits: Why does it fit this categorization?

fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for this analysis
fields.fileTooltip: Accepted formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT files
fields.legislationCheckDescription: Select legislation to verify contract compliance against specific laws and regulations

contractType.label: Contract Type
contractType.noTypesAvailable: No contract types are currently available

management.title: Contract Type Management
management.description: Manage contract types and their settings

dialog.createDescription: Create a new contract type with its settings

placeholders.name: e.g., Service Agreement
placeholders.description: Brief description of this contract type

import.title: Import Contract Type from Reference Document
import.description: Upload a reference contract document to automatically generate a new contract type with basic guidelines
import.errorNoName: Please enter a name for the contract type
import.errorUnknown: An unexpected error occurred during import

fields.name: Contract Type Name
fields.namePlaceholder: Enter a name for the contract type...
fields.nameHint: This will be the display name for the imported contract type
fields.descriptionPlaceholder: Enter a description for this import...
fields.descriptionHint: This will help you identify the imported contract type later
fields.fileHint: Upload a high-quality reference contract document. Accepted formats: PDF, DOC, DOCX, TXT

processing.title: Processing Document
processing.description: Analyzing the document and generating contract type with guidelines...
processing.steps: Extracting contract information and clause types...

completed.title: Import Completed
completed.description: Your contract type has been created successfully. You can now review and complete the setup.
completed.redirecting: Automatically redirecting to contract type management...

guidelines.title: Guidelines Management
guidelines.description: Manage compliance guidelines for contract types

noGuidelines.title: No Guidelines Found
noGuidelines.description: No guidelines have been created for this contract type yet. Click "Create Guideline" to add your first compliance guideline.

clauseTypeId.label: Clause Type ID
clauseTypeId.description: Use lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens only. This will be the unique identifier for this guideline.

standardWording.label: Standard Wording
standardWording.placeholder: Enter the standard wording or requirements for this clause type...

evaluationQuestions.label: Evaluation Questions
evaluationQuestions.description: Questions used to evaluate compliance with this guideline

examples.label: Examples
examples.description: Example clauses or wording that demonstrate compliance

generateQuestions.tooltip: Use AI to generate evaluation questions based on the standard wording

generateExamples.tooltip: Use AI to generate alternative clause wording examples

reviewDialog.title: Review Generated Content
reviewDialog.description: Review the AI-generated content below. You can edit, remove, or add items before applying them to your guideline.
reviewDialog.empty: No content was generated. Please try again.

errors.generateQuestions: Failed to generate evaluation questions. Please try again.
errors.generateExamples: Failed to generate examples. Please try again.
errors.requiresStandardWording: Please enter standard wording before generating content.
errors.requiresContractType: Contract type information is required for generation.

validation.clauseTypeIdFormat: Clause type ID must contain only lowercase letters, numbers, and hyphens
validation.clauseTypeIdLength: Clause type ID must be 50 characters or less
validation.nameLength: Name must be 100 characters or less
validation.standardWordingLength: Standard wording must be 2000 characters or less
validation.questionsRequired: At least one evaluation question is required
validation.questionLength: Evaluation questions must be 500 characters or less
validation.exampleLength: Examples must be 1000 characters or less

contractType.placeholder: Select a contract type to manage guidelines

search.placeholder: Search guidelines by name, clause type, or wording...

delete.title: Delete Guideline
delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this guideline? This action cannot be undone.

status.activateDescription: This contract type was imported from a reference document and is currently inactive. Review the guidelines below and activate the contract type when ready.

validation.noGuidelines: Cannot activate contract type: At least one guideline is required
validation.incompleteGuidelines: Cannot activate contract type: {{count}} guideline(s) are missing evaluation questions

mockData.tooltip: Contract type for UI testing and validation
